docs.snippet: Auston Matthews, who is expected to be the No. 1 pick in the 2016 N.H.L. draft, had a hat trick to lead the United States to a 7-0 victory over the Czech Republic in the quarterfinals of the world junior hockey championship in Helsinki, Finland....
docs.lead_paragraph: Auston Matthews, who is expected to be the No. 1 pick in the 2016 N.H.L. draft, had a hat trick to lead the United States to a 7-0 victory over the Czech Republic in the quarterfinals of the world junior hockey championship in Helsinki, Finland.
docs.abstract: United States defeats Czech Republic, 7-0, in quarterfinals of world junior hockey championship.
